name: Candle Esencia
description: A candle e-commerce website with a custom CMS, CRM and payment gateway integration

name: Global IBMS
description: A CRM, SCM, BPM, CMS application for a pharmaceutical company to manage their business

name: Rock Paper Scissors Game
description: Another challenge from frontend-mentor.io, a rock paper scissors game with a twist, where you can play against bot with a score board to keep track of your score

name: Spotify Clone
description: My attempt to clone spotify web app, with primary focus on UI and UX and to learn more about tailwind css

name: Space Tourism
description: A frontend-mentor.io challenge of a space tourism website based on glassmorphism design

name: News Site
description: A degres college 2nd year project, a news site to display data from rapid API new scrapper API with support for dark theme, for that late night reading

name: Dmeter
description: Final year project prototype of a restaurant management system with a custom CMS, CRM and payment gateway integration, where resturants and its branch can manage their business
